# 함수 만들기
def jongmin(data):
    result = pd.DataFrame()
    result = (data - data.mean()) / data.std()
    return result

df = pd.read_csv('../input/bigdatacertificationkr/basic1.csv')
data = df['f5']

scaled_f5 = jongmin(data)
answer = scaled_f5.median()
print(answer)
